embed.description: Playing Full AP Malphite Support Season 6 2016, Was a very fun champ to play/learn haha. Would love to try some Malphite Top as tank. ►► Subscribe to Join us on our Adventures!: ►https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVjr676PJJDILJ1fXH496TQ CHECK US OUT @ ►Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/TwinzAU ►Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TwinzAU ►Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/TwinzAU

replies.body:
Malphite Support seems to be super underrated.

2 hard CC as well as a passive shield and armour shredder makes him one of the best peelers.

And that ult _shudders_
